title: Pi-DE browser rendering tests with surf
summary: Implemented Pi-DE browser rendering tests using surf CLI. Created browser-rendering.test.ts with 8 passing tests that verify: Pi-DE loads without console errors, roster displays agents, page renders with correct content, layout is valid, UI elements are interactive, JavaScript errors are caught, viewport is responsive, and DOM structure is valid. Tests use surf --tab-id isolation pattern to avoid hijacking user tabs. All tests pass (8/8, 18.3s).

tests: loads successfully with no console errors
displays the roster with registered agents
shows content when page is rendered
page renders without major layout issues
displays UI without JavaScript errors in console
viewport is properly sized and responsive
has valid DOM structure and no critical rendering failures
